0.3.name: wordpress/adams-razor
0.3.description: "Entities must not be multiplied beyond necessity" - this is my application of Occam's Razor to WordPress theme design. You can spend time on design once you've written everything you want to write. It's extremely light-weight, so before installing too many plug-ins, think of Thoreau: "A man is rich in proportion to the number of things he can afford to let alone." Enjoy. Adam. P.S This theme is responsive.
